Class Jmol3dBoxController

  • java.lang.Object

extends Jmol3dController

        Returns:

      • showMultiStepBox

        public void showMultiStepBox(java.io.File aDpdFile,
                             IGraphicalParticle[] aGraphicalParticles)
                      throws java.util.zip.ZipException,
                             java.io.IOException
        Displays DPD data for a multi step simulation. As source serves a DPD result Zip file.
        Parameters:
        aDpdFile - Dpd result Zip file. All Data from the "Steps" folder will be visualised.
        aGraphicalParticles - Graphical particle data.
        Throws:
        java.util.zip.ZipException - ZipException
        java.io.IOException - IOException
